description:
Realizing Onigashima’s impending threat, imperiling everyone’s life, Yamato and Momonosuke launch a secret operation. Meanwhile, Sanji and Zoro are both in a deadly battle against Queen and King.
Source: Crunchyroll

titles.title: Die Situation spitz sich zu! – Das Ende von Onigashima!
Fuun Kyuu o Tsugeru! Onigashima no Matsuro!
The Situation Has Grown Tense! The End of Onigashima!
風雲急を告げる! 鬼ヶ島の末路!
